meanings.sent1: I will create a new drawing for my art class.
meanings.sent2: The chef will create a delicious meal for us.
meanings.sent3: Let's create a fun game to play at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her words can create a beautiful picture in your mind.
meanings.sent5: The magician used his wand to create a stunning illusion.

meanings.sent1: Eating too much candy can create a stomachache.
meanings.sent2: The loud noise will create a disturbance in the classroom.
meanings.sent3: His silly dance moves create laughter among his friends.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected news can create chaos in the office.
meanings.sent5: The strong wind can create a sense of urgency to find shelter.

meanings.definition: Produce something through artistic or imaginative effort.
meanings.sent1: She will create a beautiful poem for the school competition.
meanings.sent2: The artist can create stunning sculptures out of clay.
meanings.sent3: The children create colorful drawings on the sidewalk with chalk.
meanings.sent4: His music can create a sense of calm and relaxation.
meanings.sent5: The author can create a whole new world with just words on a page.
